critical_workflows: Product Search and Product Detail Page (PDP) Display
Add to Bag and Basic Checkout (Guest)

test_scenarios.name: Homepage Load and Navigation to Brand Page
steps: Click on a prominent brand logo (e.g., Fenty Beauty, Rare Beauty)
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads completely and all elements are displayed.  Clicking the brand logo redirects to the corresponding brand page without error.

test_scenarios.name: Product Search and PDP Validation
steps: Enter a valid product name (e.g., "Lipstick") in the search bar
Click the search button or press Enter
Select a product from the search results
Verify the Product Detail Page (PDP) loads
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results are displayed. Clicking on a product navigates to the corresponding PDP without error, and the PDP loads completely.

test_scenarios.name: Add to Bag and Guest Checkout - Single Item
steps: Verify the 'View Bag' button is available
Enter a valid email address and ZIP code
test_scenarios.expected_result: Product is successfully added to the bag.  User is able to initiate guest checkout and the shipping address form is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Account Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their account page or a relevant logged-in state.

test_scenarios.name: Homepage Load on Mobile
steps: Access https://www.sephora.com on a mobile browser (or use developer tools to simulate mobile view)
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads completely and is responsive to the mobile viewport.  Layout is usable and elements are displayed correctly.
